name: The Lich's Labyrinth
description:
Being a Lich just isn't what it used to be. Ever since technology started going crazy, those skeletal soldiers don't pose much of a threat anymore. That's why you decided to upgrade your troops with the same technology! Augmented speed, advanced pathfinding, artificial intelligence... wait. Maybe that last one wasn't such a good idea, since the skeleton-androids have turned on you. Time to run!

This is a turn-based puzzle game. Make your way to the stairs to reach the next floor, and try not to get caught by the rebelling undead.

Controls: Arrow keys to move.
